snippet: The American Kennel Club is best known as the go-to place for registering purebreds and as the governing body for dog shows. But the club is coming under increased scrutiny.
abstract: American Kennel Club, best known as the go-to place for registering purebred puppies and as the governing body for dog shows, faces criticism over inspections and lobbying.

byline.original: By MARY PILON and SUSANNE CRAIG

lead_paragraph: The American Kennel Club is best known as the go-to place for registering purebreds and as the governing body for dog shows. But the club is coming under increased scrutiny.

headline.seo: Many Animal Lovers Now See American Kennel Club as an Outlier
headline.main: Safety Concerns Stoke Criticism of Kennel Club
headline.print_headline: Safety Concerns Stoke Criticism of Kennel Club

keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
keywords.name: organizations
